customAnnotations.title: Zootique
customAnnotations.description: The Zootique, Racine Zoo's dynamic gift shop offers exclusive apparel, souvenirs, and gifts for the whole family. Guests can find everything from postcards to magic socks and a few four foot plush giraffes!

customAnnotations.title: Benstead Discovery Center
customAnnotations.description: Turtles, bats, snakes and more from all over the world are waiting to be discovered in the Benstead Discovery Center.

customAnnotations.title: Max and Jenny's Jungle Grill
customAnnotations.description: Time for lunch? How about a snack? Our Jungle Grill seasonally serves up delicious food. Eat inside or enjoy your meal at a picnic table overlooking our Walkabout Creek.

customAnnotations.title: Walkabout Creek
customAnnotations.description: G’Day Mate! Watch a kangaroo hop right in front of you in this open concept exhibit. Be sure to look for the wallaroos as well – they are smaller and darker than the kangaroos!

customAnnotations.title: Norco Aviary
customAnnotations.description: Feed and visit with colorful, talkative birds that are sure to delight the whole family.

customAnnotations.title: Barnyard Safari
customAnnotations.description: Make some friends on the farm  - seasonally, meet and groom goats, sheep, pigs and more!

customAnnotations.title: Robinson Crusoe Adventure Land
customAnnotations.description: A fun play land for the little ones in your group, this playground features climbing, small slides and a sandbox with toys to engage your child’s creativity.

customAnnotations.title: Bear Ridge
customAnnotations.description: Wander around bear ridge to view our charismatic Andean Bears! Be sure to visit all three windows to spot them playing, foraging, or taking a nap.

customAnnotations.title: Pheasantry
customAnnotations.description: Get up close and personal with native raptors in this exhibit. Look high up on the perches to spot one of our feathered friends!

customAnnotations.title: Meerkat Manor
customAnnotations.description: Home to both our meerkats and our African Penguins, this exhibit joins sand and surf for two of our most playful groups of animals!

customAnnotations.title: Junior League of Racine Zoo Choo Express Train Depot
customAnnotations.description: All aboard! Join us for a relaxing cruise through the zoo on our Zoo Choo Express, open seasonally.

customAnnotations.title: Great Cat Canyon
customAnnotations.description: Watch a tiger patrol their territory, a lynx scale a rock wall, or come face to face with a lion in our Great Cat Canyon

customAnnotations.title: Vanishing Kingdom
customAnnotations.description: Meet endangered species from around the world and learn about what you can do to help in our Vanishing Kingdom exhibit, located inside the oldest building at the zoo!

customAnnotations.title: A. B. Modine Pond
customAnnotations.description: Home to a variety of turtles, frogs, birds, and other animals, our Zoo Pond includes great places to enjoy our native wildlife that live alongside us.

customAnnotations.title: Helen Ireland Wildlife Theatre
customAnnotations.description: Enjoy free seasonal wildlife programs, or when it’s quiet step in to enjoy a peaceful view of the native wildlife in zoo pond.

customAnnotations.title: Play Zoo
customAnnotations.description: Swing like a monkey or hop like a kangaroo on our giant play zoo playground!

customAnnotations.title: Land of the Giants
customAnnotations.description: Go on an African Safari and visit African mammals hailing from the savannas of the north to the mountains of the south.

customAnnotations.title: Racine Rotary West Safari Base Camp
customAnnotations.description: This beautiful space overlooking Lake Michigan is perfect for a picnic. You may also rent this space for your party or other event.
